approaches.title: Iterate Over Dictionary Keys and Use a Generator to Lowercase Strings.
approaches.blurb: Use dict.keys() to iterate, and a generator to lowercase values.

approaches.title: Iterate Over Dictionary Keys and Use Dictionary Methods to Update.
approaches.blurb: Used dict.keys() for iteration and dict.get() with dict.setdefault() to Update

approaches.title: Dictionary Constructor with a Passed Generator Expression.
approaches.blurb: Pass a generator expression to a dictionary constructor to create a new dictionary.

approaches.title: Dictionary Comprehension
approaches.blurb: Use a dictionary comprehension to process and transform data into new dictionary.
